required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on April 13, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Application of Desferal to Treat COVID-19
clinical_study.official_title: Application of Iron Chelator (Desferal) to Reduce the Severity of COVID-19 Manifestations

brief_summary.textblock:
In this study, defined cases of COVID-19 with mild, moderate or severe pneumonia will be
      treated with standard treatment regimens in combination with IV injection of Deferoxamine.
      Improvement in clinical, laboratory and radiological manifestations will be evaluated in
      treated patient compared to control group.

secondary_outcome.measure: length of intensive care unit stay

arm_group.arm_group_label: Experimental: Desferal addition to standard treatment

arm_group_label: Experimental: Desferal addition to standard treatment

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

        Clinical diagnosis of COVID-19 Disease,

        Exclusion Criteria:

        Previous history of allergy to Deferoxamin, Pregnancy, kidney dysfunction,
